review: It was a good experience. The doctor was very friendly and easy to talk to and explained all the issues and treatments in great detail.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Firstly I would like to thank Dr. Sheena soni for taking such good care of my son and treating him on time so that there was no further damage, she was always available to explain about my doubts, also during my sons dental surgery she was very supportive and explained us all the procedure, so thay we are well prepared. We have had one of the best experience with Dr. Sheena soni and would love to recommend to all the parents having tough time with childs dental issues.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sheena Soni is a very experienced doctor and she did well to remove the teeth of Aarnav Dash and also suggested us to do in future for Aarnav. I strongly recommend her to other patients for having dental treatments through the expertise or advise of Dr.Soni.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Clean and sanitized clinic.
********* ************* ******* **** a professional approach.
She addressed my issue and explained what process she was performing step by step.
Extremely satisfied and would recommend her to all patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited with my 5 yr old daughter for extreme pain in her teeth. For which the doctor helped me out and explained all the possibilities. I was very scared as to how my daughter would respond on seeing a doctor and getting her first ever Root Canal done but Dr. Sheena as well her husband both were very humble and patient with my child. I appreciate their hard work and patience and would definitely recommend others.
Dr shena is very friendly.  My daughter who is 6 yrs old having teeth issues mostly cavities. She removed all the cavities. Dr shena is a very good dentist. üëç
